website_summaries.verdict: A solid, well-made ottoman just the right size for a comfortable footrest; it can also serve as an extra seat.
pros: Blends in with just about all patio furniture styles with a water-resistant cushion that's about 4 in
Removing the cushion turns it into a table
cons: You may want to attach the cushion to the top with hook-and-loop tape to keep it from blowing away or falling off

customer_reviews.title: Good value cushion moves too much
customer_reviews.text: I really like this piece. Its solid and well made and a good value, but there is no way to attach the cushion so it blows away or gets knocked off a lot. Otherwise I would have given a five.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great little foot stool
customer_reviews.text: Perfect foot stool. Not to big not too small. Goes with my Big Lots patio chair. Only thing is, you will need to Velcro the cushion down. It slides off. I am not a fan of the silver metal leg corner strips and will end up painting them dark brown. Otherwise this is a sturdy, perfect little foot stool.
customer_reviews.author: NatJH

customer_reviews.title: Great look, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! But I should have bought two so we don't fight over it! Came early,no damage,perfect match to my existing set! Very pleased with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Denese

customer_reviews.title: Perfect height
customer_reviews.text: So the size listed is only for the base. With the cushion it brings it up to the perfect height for your foot rest. The cushion is NOT attached, it just sits on top of the stool.
customer_reviews.author: SAlford

customer_reviews.title: Nice ottoman
customer_reviews.text: This item matched another products vinyl wicket set very well. No assembly required, inbox itvand put your feet up. Ok to use as stool got grandkids to sit on too
customer_reviews.author: Burkie

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was the best price for an ottoman and the cushions is very nice and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Nice ! Glad I bought this, it fits perfectly with my other patio furniture.
customer_reviews.author: M. Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good size Well made, very sturdy n nice thick cushion
customer_reviews.author: Norma V.

customer_reviews.title: The cushion doesn't attach.
customer_reviews.text: Looked all over for a reasonably priced ottoman and this fit the bill, just wish the cushion attached in some way.
customer_reviews.author: coolkeepe12

customer_reviews.title: Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured and described. I needed only a foot rest to add to the outdoor furniture I already have. It’s just what I had in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Brunner

customer_reviews.title: There exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 outside ottomans with cushions They are perfect. Extremely happy with my purchase. Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: jacalyn A.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: You don't have to assemble and the cushion is very thick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Great Deal Furniture Malibu Outdoor 16 Inch Multibrown Wicker Ottoman Seat with Beige Water Resistant Cushion
product_meta.description: Color:Multibrown + BeigeMake sure you always have a beautiful place to kick up your feet with this charming outdoor ottoman. This ottoman can also double as a seat when dining or when extra people show up for lunch. Made from the highest quality waterproof fabric and wicker, it’s designed to bring you happiness for years to come. A perfect purchase!
feature_bullets: Make sure you always have a beautiful place to kick up your feet with this charming outdoor ottoman. This ottoman can also double as a seat when dining or when extra people show up for lunch. Made from the highest quality waterproof fabric and wicker, it’s designed to bring you happiness for years to come. A perfect purchase!
Includes: One (1) Ottoman. Material: Polyethylene Wicker. Cushion Material: Water Resistant Fabric
Composition: 100% Polyester. Frame Material: Iron. Wicker Finish: Multibrown
Cushion Color: Beige. Frame Finish: Multibrown. No Assembly Required
Hand Crafted Details. Dimensions: 16.30 inches deep x 16.30 inches wide x 12.50 inches high
